subscription.description: Breeding Journey offers subscription-based access to certain features. By subscribing, you agree to the following conditions:
items: Billing: Subscriptions are billed on a recurring monthly or yearly basis through Stripe.
Auto-Renewal: Your subscription will automatically renew unless cancelled before the renewal date.
Cancellation: You may cancel your subscription at any time. Your access will remain active until the end of the paid period.
Refunds: We do not provide refunds for unused subscription periods, except where required by law.
Payment Processing: All payments are handled securely by Stripe. We do not store credit card information.
